questions.question: This character, cursed by a powerful sorceress, is doomed to remain in a monstrous form unless he can earn the love of another before the last petal falls.

questions.answer: What is the Gospel of John?

questions.question: Alexander Graham Bell is credited with inventing this communication device in 1876.

This American poet wrote, 'I celebrate myself, and sing myself' in Leaves of Grass.
